dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3235493I] http://store4rs.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----

To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3235493I] http://store4rs.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

From: Jagex Copyright Team <copyright@jagex.com>

MIME-Version: 1.0 
To:  abuse@theplanet.com 
Subject: http://store4rs.com 
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-15; format=flowed 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

FILETIME=[BCBDA5A0:01C7598B] 

MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello from Jagex, 
 
I work within Community Management for the massive multiplayer online  
game RuneScape (www.RuneScape.com). 
 
I have discovered that you host a website at http://store4rs.com which  
undertakes or facilitates trading in RuneScape items to enable cheating

at RuneScape. As well as using an image of belonging to us, that has  
been modified slightly, this can be found on the homepage of the site. 
 
Such behaviour damages our game and infringes our intellectual property

and other legal rights. 
 
Please contact me within 7 days to confirm that you will remove this  
website. 
 
Otherwise I will pass the matter to our lawyers. 
 
Sincerely 
 
Mod_Khan 
The Copyright Team 
Jagex Ltd. 
 
--  
 
IMPORTANT NOTICE 
 
The sender does not guarantee that this message, including any
attachment, is secure or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be
privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. If you are not the
intended recipient, do not disclose or copy it or its contents. Please
telephone or email the sender and delete the message entirely from your
system. 
Jagex Limited is a company registered in England & Wales with company
number 03982706 and a registered office at St. Andrews House, 90 St.
Andrews Road, Cambridge, CB4 1DL, UK.
